| HistoryText             = The Bashenga Unit was a squad of the [[Wakandan Army (Earth-616)|Wakandan Army]] deployed by King [[T'Chaka (Earth-616)|T'Chaka]] when [[Hydra (Earth-616)|Hydra]] forces led by [[Wolfgang von Strucker (Earth-616)|Baron Strucker]] attempted to push through the Wakandan border.{{r|Rise of the Black Panther Vol 1 1}}
